title: Person of Interest - The Great Filter (05x08)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Rewatched this episode today in 2021...Person of Interest has predicted a lot of things...I can't help but wonder if this was their "prediction" of COVID and the vaccinations...
Have you the scene where Elias tells Harold that he's the darkest of all of them?
You all see the two demon faces in the gentlemans' jacket right? Truth in Media, lies on the News, Manufactured everything. Wow
This show is just awesome. I wonder what will happen when current outbreak ends. Governments just keep collecting personal datas. I wonder how will it end?

I just rewatched this episode. It is so eerie how similar it is to the current pandemic outbreak. Especially the last scene with the American population volunteering to get tested was very spot on, really makes you wonder about what is currently happing. Episodes like this, are a perfect example of, how this show was frighteningly ahead of its time.
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 8
